book.synopsis: In The Valley of Thunder, Clive Folliot and his fellow captives face a new death daily. Against dinosaurs and cave creatures, giant worms and shark people, the group battles for their lives. Torn between continuing his search for his twin, the elusive Neville, or helping his comrades return home, Clive splits the party, doubling their chances of success -- and their danger. Is it worth the gamble? In The Lake of Fire, Clive is at last reunited with Neville, and the brothers and their troops escape to the next level of the Dungeon -- a place straight out of Dante
s the Dungeon 2: The Valley of Thunder/the Lake of Fire
